Description: The technical specifications to refer when using the package. Easy-going, offline supported (via web PWA installation), and detailed oriented. Courtesy from ZORALab's Hestia.

Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-display
CSS PROPERTY : display
DEFAULT      : block (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the display mode of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Display

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 0 0 2rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-text-align
CSS PROPERTY : text-align
DEFAULT      : left (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the text alignment of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Text Align

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-li-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 2rem 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the list item's margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: List Item Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --olist-li-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the list item's padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: List Item Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-before-content
CSS PROPERTY : content
DEFAULT      : "‚ù°" (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's content of the list item (bullet) for the
rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Content

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-before-display
CSS PROPERTY : display
DEFAULT      : block (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's display mode of the list item (bullet) for
the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Display

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-before-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's margin of the list item (bullet) for the
rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-before-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's padding of the list item (bullet) for the
rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-before-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : 1px solid transparent (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's border of the list item (bullet) for the
rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Border

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-before-border-radius
CSS PROPERTY : border-radius
DEFAULT      : 50% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's border-radius of the list item (bullet) for
the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Border Radius

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-before-font-size
CSS PROPERTY : font-size
DEFAULT      : 2.8rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's font size of the list item (bullet) for
the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Font Size

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-before-font-weight
CSS PROPERTY : font-weight
DEFAULT      : 800 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's font weight of the list item (bullet) for
the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Font Weight

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-before-text-align
CSS PROPERTY : text-align
DEFAULT      : left (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's text alignment of the list item (bullet) for
the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Text Align

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-background-image
CSS PROPERTY : background-image
DEFAULT      :
(>= v1.2.0)
linear-gradient(to bottom, var(--color-primary-200), var(--color-primary-400))
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's coloration of the list item (bullet) for the
rendered component.
Designs.Title: Bullet Background Image

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-background-image-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : background-image-inverted
DEFAULT      :
(>= v1.2.0)
linear-gradient(to bottom, var(--color-primary-200), var(--color-primary-400))
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's coloration of the list item (bullet) for the
rendered component while in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Bullet Background Image (Inverted)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --ulist-li-background-image-print
CSS PROPERTY : background-image-print
DEFAULT      :
(>= v1.2.0)
linear-gradient(to bottom, var(--body-color-print), var(--body-color-print))
Designs.Description:
Affects the before-pseudo-element's coloration of the list item (bullet) for the
rendered component while in print mode.
Designs.Title: Bullet Background Image (Print Mode)

Designs.Description: Fortunately, this component does not use any JavaScript. Relax.
Designs.Title: JavaScript

Functions.Description: Render the CSS output for this UI component.
Functions.Title: ToCSS

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package's primary purpose is to provide user interface (UI) styling
specifically for unordered list values.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Main Purpose

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package was known as 'ulist_hestiaUI' before
ZORALab's Hestia 'v1.2.0'. The transformation was due to someone attempting to
steal the design copyrights and makes way for programming package's
documentation restructuring.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Legacy Recording

Title: zoralabULIST Technical Specification - ZORALab's Hestia
